solution_line_template: There are {cubs_born_per_month}-{lions_die_per_month}=<<{cubs_born_per_month}-{lions_die_per_month}={net_lions_per_month}>>{net_lions_per_month} more lions each month.
There will be {net_lions_per_month}*{months_in_year}=<<{net_lions_per_month}*{months_in_year}={lions_added_in_year}>>{lions_added_in_year} more lions after 1 year.
There will be {initial_lions}+{lions_added_in_year}=<<{initial_lions}+{lions_added_in_year}={total_lions}>>{total_lions} lions in Londolozi after 1 year.
